provenance.textSnippet: A CT scan of the full chest and abdomen (with image of liver and adrenal glands) will be used in the evaluation of tumor responses, as per Table 2...
provenance.rationale: The protocol explicitly states that a CT scan of the chest and abdomen is the primary imaging modality for evaluating tumor responses.

provenance.textSnippet: Subjects with signs or symptoms of CNS involvement will undergo MRI (or CT scan if MRI is contraindicated) to confirm absence of CNS metastases.
provenance.rationale: The protocol specifies that an MRI of the brain is required for subjects presenting with signs or symptoms of CNS involvement.

provenance.textSnippet: Subjects with signs or symptoms of CNS involvement will undergo MRI (or CT scan if MRI is contraindicated) to confirm absence of CNS metastases.
provenance.rationale: The protocol specifies that a CT scan of the brain is used as an alternative to MRI if MRI is contraindicated for subjects with signs of CNS involvement.

provenance.textSnippet: Response criteria will be assessed using RECIST (version 1.1). Changes in the measurable lesions over the course of therapy must be evaluated using the criteria listed below.
provenance.rationale: The protocol explicitly defines that tumor response will be evaluated using the RECIST version 1.1 criteria.

autoApprovedItems.reasoning: The protocol and extraction data explicitly define the imaging modalities (CT, MRI), body regions (Chest, Abdomen, Brain), and the response criteria (RECIST 1.1) that constitute the Tumor Assessments activity.

provenance.textSnippet: Plasma concentrations of veliparib will be determined using validated methods under the supervision of the Drug Analysis Department at AbbVie.
provenance.rationale: This is an explicitly named analyte to be measured in plasma as part of the pharmacokinetic sampling for Veliparib.

provenance.textSnippet: Plasma concentrations of veliparib metabolite(s) may be determined using validated or non-validated methods.
provenance.rationale: This is an explicitly named analyte (or group of analytes) to be measured in plasma as part of the pharmacokinetic sampling for Veliparib.

autoApprovedItems.reasoning: The protocol explicitly defines the two analytes, veliparib and its metabolite(s), that will be measured from the collected PK samples. This information is present in both the extraction JSON and confirmed on page 53 of the protocol PDF.

components.name: NCCN-Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy (FACT) Lung Symptom Index-17

provenance.textSnippet: To assess the subject's health-related quality of life and symptoms, two questionnaires will be administered: the NCCN-Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy (FACT) Lung Symptom Index-17 (NFLSI-17)...
provenance.rationale: This is explicitly named as one of the two questionnaires administered to assess the subject's health-related quality of life.

components.name: European Quality of Life-5 Dimensions 5 Level

provenance.textSnippet: ...and the European Quality of Life-5 Dimensions (EQ-5D-5L).
provenance.rationale: This is explicitly named as one of the two questionnaires administered to assess the subject's health-related quality of life.

proposal.reasoning: The protocol explicitly defines two questionnaires that comprise the Quality of Life assessments: NFLSI-17 and EQ-5D-5L. This is clearly stated on page 50 and captured in the extraction JSON.
